urls.title: Pizza Paradise
urls.description: Fake data with real trends Pizza Paradise is a fake dataset on a pizzeria franchise. It was generated by the Observable team for demo purposes, and works well for a variety of visualization forms. Pizza Paradise is trying to figure out which of our pizza products perform best in the market. Customers can pick from our selection of top pizzas, such as your classic pepperoni pizza, hawaiian pizza, meat lovers, and many more. Pizza Paradise has many pizzerias throughout California and Nevada, so it's helpful f

tweets.text:
Need data? Want it pizza themed? We got you. Introducing Pizza Paradise - a fake dataset with real trends. We wanted a good demo dataset that would work well for a variety of visualization forms, so we built one ourself. About pizza üçïüçïüçï Enjoy!

https://t.co/oozf48li8A
